full_description:
Montech Air Cooler 210 ARGB CPU Cooler

The Montech Air Cooler 210 CPU Cooler is the first fully blackened ARGB premium CPU cooler. It adapts Air Fan PF120 ARGB PWM fan, focusing on heat dissipation and silent performance. Also providing amazing 210W TDP heat dissipation capability. With the ARGB lighting effects, it is a deluxe choice for gamers who seek silence and overclocking.

Massive Cooling Power

The AIR COOLER 210 combines an ideal wide fin design with six highly efficient heat pipes to achieve exceptional cooling capabilities. With a remarkable heat dissipation capacity of up to 210W TDP, this air cooler effectively lowers the CPU temperature even during an intense performance, ensuring optimal cooling performance.

Brighten Up Your PC

The Montech Air Cooler 210 CPU Cooler fan offers impressive addressable RGB lighting effects, which can be synchronized with your motherboard for seamless integration. Experience complete control over the lighting effects through your mainboard software, allowing you to personalize and customize the aesthetics of your system.

Quiet Operation Under Heavy Loads

Equipped with a fluid dynamic bearing fan, it ensures a prolonged fan lifespan while operating silently. Even when running at a maximum 100% PWM fan speed, the noise level remains below 29.3 dBA, delivering efficient airflow of up to 73CFM.

100% RAM Compatibility

The Montech Air Cooler 210 ARGB CPU Cooler features an innovative slanted heat pipe design that positions the heatsink away from the RAM area, eliminating any height restrictions for RAM modules.

Easy-to-Install Mounting Kit

The AIR COOLER 210 is equipped with a user-friendly mounting kit and offers compatibility with the latest Intel and AMD platforms. It supports a wide range of Intel socket types, including 115X, 1200, 1366, 2011(V3), 2066, and 1700. For AMD, it is compatible with AM2(+), AM3(+), AM4, FM1, and FM2(+) sockets.

High-Performance Cooling

The Montech Air Cooler 210 CPU Cooler maximizes thermal conduction with the help of six high-performance copper heat pipes. Combined with a polished copper base, the AIR COOLER 210 achieves outstanding cooling performance.

Stealth Black Design

The AIR COOLER features a unique black coating that serves a dual purpose: protecting the underlying metallic components and creating a sleek, minimalist aesthetic.

full_description:
Montech Metal DT24 Premium CPU Air Cooler

The Montech Metal DT24 Premium CPU Air Cooler is designed for performance and quiet operation. It has two METAL 120 PWM high-performance fans. operates on its Quie. At maximum fan speed, the noise level is only 30dB(A). The heat generated by a powerful 12th Generation Intel processor may be dispersed. This CPU cooler has a classic and attractive appearance. It features a black finish and an ARGB aluminum top cover. It is equipped with six high-efficiency copper heat pipes. Installing RAM without interfering with the CPU. the metal DT24 Premium CPU Air Cooler has 270W TDP. It is simple to set up. It includes brackets for the most recent 1700 and AM5 models.

Ultimate Cooling Ability

This Montech Metal DT24 Premium CPU Air Cooler is designed with two METAL 120 PWM fans, each with a 6-pole motor and a maximum static pressure fan blade design to improve airflow over the heat sink. This optimum heat dissipation surface area and TDP of 270W make cooling the most powerful CPU easier and more effective.

Functions Quietly

Because of the high density 104 layered heatsink fins, optimal spacing between the cooling fins, and noise reduction function, the noise level can be kept under 30dB(A) even at maximum fan speed. To achieve a quieter performance, the fan speed may be regulated via PWM mode.

Six Heat pipes and Dual Tower Design

The Montech Metal DT24 Premium CPU Air Cooler is made of metal. Dual Tower coolers provide a bigger heat dissipation surface area than single tower coolers. The METAL DT24 Premium combines six innovative 6mm copper heat pipes with a customized fin design to improve heat transmission capacity. Additionally, the twin fan system increases airflow for optimal cooling efficiency.

Advanced Engineering

The METAL DT24 has a total heat dissipation surface area of 8553.23 cm2. This makes it exceptionally efficient at dispersing CPU heat across a broadly extended surface and even more efficient at cooling through the maximum airflow from its two-fan system.

Maximum Robust Airflow

The core of the two METAL 120 PWM fans is a 6 pole motor packed into a reinforced metal axial hub, together with its HDB bearing and double dynamic balance correction technique, resulting in a fan that is a high performance, long lifetime, and low noise all in one.

ARGB Aluminum Top Cover

The Montech Metal DT24 Premium CPU Air Cooler top cover is made with contemporary CNC technology and anodized suitably, which strengthens the aluminum surface and provides you with a smoother hand feel. This shows off the quality of aluminum to the utmost. With ARGB lighting on the METAL DT24's perimeter, our premium and appealing design offer the user a one-of-a-kind experience.
